name: 4Dots - The Fun Of Colors
description:
4Dots - The Fun Of Colors

Just find the combination of number and same color and get more score.

How to play:
1. Find the two same numbers in different color and get 10 points.
2. Find the two same numbers in the same color and get 20 points.
3. Find the four different colors in different color and get 50 points.
4. Find the four different colors in the same color and get 100 points.
5. If there hasn't find any combination from above four then use 'Paint Brush' or '123 Swipe' help tool to change the number or color.
6. Classic mode, you need to achieve the target score with in giving steps and move further for the next level.
7. Timed mode, you have 30s to score as much as you can.
8. Step mode,you have 30 steps to score as much as you can.
9. Endless mode, you have unlimited steps and seconds to do more fun and get more score as you can.

You can share your best score on Facebook or Twitter or mail to give challenge to your friends!
